cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.9.0)
project(qlivestyleeditor)

set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTORCC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTOUIC ON)

find_package(
    Qt5
    COMPONENTS
        Widgets
    REQUIRED
)

add_executable(
    qlivestyleeditor
        src/main.cpp
        src/qlivestyleeditor.cpp
)

# This puts autogenerated files into a hidden directory.
set_target_properties(
    qlivestyleeditor
    PROPERTIES
        AUTOGEN_BUILD_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/.mocuic"
)

# This is necessary because this project uses Qt's internal css parsing.
include_directories(
    ${Qt5Core_OWN_PRIVATE_INCLUDE_DIRS}
    ${Qt5Gui_OWN_PRIVATE_INCLUDE_DIRS}
)

target_link_libraries(
    qlivestyleeditor
        Qt5::Widgets
)
